attributes.action: Petition to change the pip rules back to old rules
attributes.additional_details: We want this new style system to be changed back to the old system it's not fair for new claims to be assessed differently from people who are currently claiming p.i.p, it's not one rule for one and one rule for another, this isn't fair and it's actually a disgrace to think that others need to be assessed alot harder than previous claimants, we feel that it's only fair that EVERYONE IS ASSESSED THE EXACT SAME WAY AS EVERYONE ELSE!
attributes.background: Thousands of people who are currently receiving personal independence payment and thousands of people who are going to claim personal independence payment ask and deserve the right to be assessed by the old system not this two teir system with the 4 point rule we all should be assessed the same way

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Stop PIP Cuts: Protect Support for Disabled People
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/721918
